movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.description: A group of kids uncovers a series of extraordinary mysteries involving secret experiments and supernatural forces.

movies.title: Money Heist
movies.description: A criminal mastermind leads a daring heist on the Royal Mint of Spain.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.description: A chemistry teacher turned meth producer faces moral and legal challenges in the criminal underworld.

movies.title: The Crown
movies.description: A biographical story about the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

movies.title: Extraction
movies.description: A fearless mercenary embarks on the most deadly mission of his career when he's hired to rescue the kidnapped son of an international crime lord.

movies.title: Red Notice
movies.description: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief in this action-packed comedy.

movies.title: The Good Place
movies.description: A woman finds herself in a heaven-like afterlife and tries to become a better person to earn her place there.

movies.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
movies.description: A hilarious look at the lives of quirky detectives in the 99th precinct of the NYPD.
